title: Nifty Bank On Watch: RBI MPC To Deliver Rate Cut Verdict Amid Steep Fall In Inflation
description: Nifty Bank will be in sharp focus ahead of the RBI’s Monetary Policy Committee decision, with the six-member panel set to announce its verdict on interest rates on Friday at 10:00 a.m. RBI Governor Sanjay Malhotra will deliver the policy outcome.
